Text: Emotiometer
It's the year 2035, it seems as though people have
Text2: become so consumed in their daily lives that they've
Text3: forgotten to recognize what they feel. Luckily
Text4: Apple, has developed a life changing emotion
Text5: tracker, the Emotiometer. How does it work you ask?
Text6: Simply download it on your Apple Watch or purchase
Text7: a sole emotion tracker and watch it tell you your

Text: It's Friday after school and not a single one of
Text2: your friends can make a decision on plans.

Text: You approach his house and see a dead dog out in
Text2: front. He seems friendly but your emotiometer
Text3: shows you that you're scared. He shows no
Text4: emotion at all. What do you do?

Text: You ask about the dog and he says his demonic
Text2: friend is coming to pick him up. You laugh but he
Text3: seems dead serious. You look outside and
Text4: the dead dog has mysteriously vanished. Your
Text5: Emotiometer is off the charts for scared.

Text: He asks you to play music on his speaker. You

Text: You go to the bathroom and notice blood on

Text: You look at your watch and you see that it shows

Text: You ask Danny if you guys can go somewhere

Text: He takes you to the roof and you guys talk as you

Text: You go to the bathroom of Danny's house and
Text2: take a shower so you can't distinguish the

Text: You get to friend2's house and he asks if you

Text: You guys get the munchies bad and try to debate

Text: You start to eat the noodles, both of you are
